body: Imagine having the power to go back in time and all you do is to save your thot gf and still failed in the end lol. He's definitely one of the unluckiest mc I've ever known like wtf every girls he's close with gets rape for no reason.

I mean yeah shes a slut who breaks too easily and gives into cock despite loving the MC - but that's the point, she represents all the ntr hentai heroines who do exactly that - what's different here is that the MC truly fights to take her back like all those other MCs ought to; this MC fights and wins her in the end, even at the cost of becoming a monster himself, and THAT'S the point. This hentai breaks the typical cliches and gives a satisfying ending that's hard to find in a lot of other stories. If a girl can be stolen through sex then she can be stolen BACK through sex; and If the girl's gonna be a mind broken slut anyway, then she might as well be YOUR (the MC's) mind broken slut. If you want something you gotta have the willpower to fight for it, more willpower than anyone else who wants it, and thats what this MC has. I seriously hope this gets translated into english one day.
Dang his girl still got fucked by other

i don't think that whore wroth all that! no let me say it like this. ''she doesn't worth shit!'' i mean she become a nyampho as soon as she got fucked and loving it, and after seeing mc she embrace him like ''whoops that did happen sorry! thanks for saving me. anyways...'' if she become like mind break state once or twice we can say wtever but even with that fucking brat she gets really into it, so if i were him i would kill the girl and be done with it! of course also kill all the cucks! just poor mc!

Also this is the main timeline now, thats the whole point of the leaping. And as for whats left behind, well his blatant suicides will probably change whatever was occuring before he threw that timeline into the shadow realm and made a new one. (Most rapists will probably bounce and avoid the heat and publicity of an event like that, plus the girl will probably snap out of it and/or kill herself too. Those other timelines are just echoes of the only timeline that now matters. A win is a win.

This is one of my favorite Netorare Doujins of all time. The protagonist doesnt give up weakly like so many ntr mcs do, he keeps fighting again and again, becoming better at fucking and making his cock more monstrous, and getting the girl back again and again - and he fucking WINS in the end and gets the girl and makes her his -- and now hes the biggest baddest mofo around when it comes to fucking so no one can steal her because hes the one thats mind broken her and made her completely his -- if you look you see based off the hair style the MC is actually the mystery guy on the cover. I fucking love it when Ntr has a happy ending, I love it when the MC wins and gets the girl, and he does it in the best possible way. AMOR VINCIT OMNIA.

No, she only gets deflowered by the boyfriend but she always gets assaulted by the same people within the month time-span. He can prevent one event from happening but not the others so he decided to go back to the exact date when he deflowered her as it seems to be the trigger of the month loops. Since he can't stop them from assaulting her so he told her about his abilities and asked her to let herself be raped while he took pictures as evidence then after the last rape event they got final sex before his suicide to end the loop. Did you notice that at the last redo, he went back in time at the day after he deflowered her which means the loops ends so there's no rape attempts as everyone got captured by the police before they can even act but this time he became broken in the process.

Wow, it's NTR even when he wins.  He's gone so mentally over the line, he considers his win still a NTR - from himself of another timeline.  He's become so chad, he understands how to seduce her after so many deaths, he convinced himself that he has NTR her from his own pathetic self.  

Also, the developer of the app is from the timeline she was raped by those thugs.  And since that universe still exist after the MC killed himself, she ponders about the consequence of so many timelines existing where the MC killed himself and "left".   This is actually pretty decent Time-leap story.
